## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).

> blockquotes are fun

You can also [strike through]{.strike}, [cross-off]{.cross}, [highlight]{.highlight}, and [circle]{.circle} text

:::{.box}
box for arbitrary content

#### tables!!

```{r}

sp500 |>
  head(10) |> 
  select(1:4) |> 
  gt() |>
    tab_header(
      title = md(paste0("**Property type listed in tax sale**"))) |> 
    cols_align(
      align = "left",
      columns = everything()
    ) |> 
    opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |> 
  tab_options(column_labels.background.color = r4OPI::opiColors()[1])

```
